name: Login
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for Evaluater login and issues the token

Request payload must contain the following fields:

USERNAME : STRING
PASSWORD : STRING

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/evaluaters/login

raw 
  {
    "username": "evaluater@unisolve.org",
    "password": "wHm6eGCL7uFOArs="
}

Response:

200 - OK 

  {"status":200,"status_type":"success","message":"Login Successful","count":1,"data":[{"user_id":40,"name":"evaluater@unisolve.org","full_name":"evaluater user","status":"ACTIVE","role":"EVALUATER","token":"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..ar9o1fI-bngisbYdJ4lClsiT-f8PsPB6jnLba70W6-c","type":"Bearer","expire":"3d"}]}
